name: confirmed-cov-notification-request
description: Request parameters for the ConfirmedCOVNotification service, used to send Change of Value notifications that require acknowledgment.

fields.name: subscriber-process-identifier
fields.description: The process identifier of the subscriber.

fields.name: initiating-device-identifier
fields.description: The identifier of the device initiating the notification.

fields.name: monitored-object-identifier
fields.description: The identifier of the object being monitored.

fields.name: time-remaining
fields.description: The remaining time in seconds before the subscription expires.

fields.name: list-of-values
fields.description: A list of property values that have changed.
